Room.Name: Main Courtyard Anteroom
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an open-air anteroom leading to Castle Ragnar's courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: Massive columns support great beams overhead, providing a solid foundation for the upper reaches of the castle above you. To the south is the open air courtyard, a huge flagstone and quarried marble assembley area. Going north from here will take you to the main gate of Castle Ragnar.
